attributes.action: Pay the families of NHS who die of C-19 their  annual salary until retirement.
attributes.additional_details: We owe thos that have fallen / will fall to Covid-19, while saving us,  a debt that money cannot redeem, but if we truly look after the families of those who fought so bravely, we honor them in truth.
attributes.background: It's not nearly enough that the Govt wants to pay Covid-19 fallen NHS staff £60,000 death benefit. If the Govt / We truly want to show our deep thanks to those who gave their lives saving ours and their families, pay the families what the employee would have earned through to retirement.
